methods.name: GetDownloadSize
methods.doc: Get the total download size for this content installation

methods.name: GetDownloadSpeed
methods.doc: Get the current download speed in megabytes per second. Valid during installation

methods.name: GetInstallProgress
methods.doc: Get the current installation progress. Between 0 and 1 for known progress, or less than 0 for unknown progress

methods.name: GetRequiredDiskSpace
methods.doc: Get the required disk space in megabytes for this content installation

methods.name: GetTotalDownloadedSize
methods.doc: Get the total downloaded size in megabytes. Valid during installation

methods.name: StartInstall
